meta.label: Dataset Sentence Embedding Ranking
meta.description: Compare each text in the Baseline Dataset with every text in the Test Dataset by computing their cosine similarity. For each baseline text, the recipe selects the top N most similar test texts based on cosine distance.

inputRoles.name: test_dataset
inputRoles.label: Test Dataset
inputRoles.description: Dataset containing the texts to be compared.

inputRoles.name: embedding_folder
inputRoles.label: Embedding Folder
inputRoles.description: Folder containing the pre-trained embedding model file.

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output Dataset
outputRoles.description: Table containing text pairs (Baseline â€“ Test) with cosine similarity, cosine distance and ranking.

params.name: baseline_text_column
params.label: Baseline Text Column
params.description: Select the column containing the original text in the Baseline Dataset.

params.name: test_text_column
params.label: Test Text Column
params.description: Select the column containing the test text in the Test Dataset.

params.name: model_filename
params.label: Model Filename
params.description: Name of the model file within the embedding folder (e.g., 'Word2vec_embeddings').

params.name: top_n
params.label: Top N Pairs
params.description: Number of top pairs (with the lowest cosine distance) to output for each Baseline text.
